step_4.prompt: Please based on this script, {script}, and it's script breakdown, {script_breakdown}, Create a complete profile for each character including {character_includes}. Create a complete profile for each location including {location_includes}. Create a complete profile for each object including {object_includes}. Please provide these profiles with details in json format all in one single json object with structure like {output_structure} and put the "script" and "script_breakdown" properties to exactly what i have provided to you in respectively {script} and {script_breakdown}

character_includes.Unique_ID: A unique identifier for the character (e.g., Character_1)

character_includes.Name: The character's name in the story

character_includes.Role: The character's role in the story

character_includes.Appearance_Features: Gender, age, skin color, hair color and style, facial details

character_includes.Clothing: A detailed description of the clothing and its specifics

location_includes.Unique_ID: A unique identifier for the location (e.g., Location_1)

location_includes.General_Description: Type of location (e.g., room, forest, street)

location_includes.Environmental_Features: Environmental features based on {location_includes.General_Description} like these examples {Environmental_Features_examples}

location_includes.Lighting: Light sources, type of lighting (natural, artificial), intensity, and color of light

location_includes.General_Mood: Atmosphere and visual feeling of the location

object_includes.Unique_ID: A unique identifier for the object (e.g., Object_1)

object_includes.Name: The name of the object (e.g., table, mirror)

object_includes.Features: Material, color, size, condition (new or old)

object_includes.Scene_Position: Where the object is located and its role in the story

room: list of furniture with their location
living_room: list of furniture with their location

scenes.visuals: Close-up of protagonist brushing teeth in a well-lit bathroom.
scenes.narration: You've been here a thousand times... brushing, rinsing, unaware...

scenes.visuals: The protagonist glances at the mirror, noticing a shadow in the background.
The camera focuses on the mirror. The shadow is clearer—a dark figure, unmoving.
scenes.audio: A distorted crackling sound from the mirror.
scenes.narration: A presence looms... yet the room behind remains empty.

scenes.visuals: The protagonist turns slowly to check behind them—no one there.
scenes.audio: Heartbeat intensifies, a subtle gasping grows stronger.
scenes.narration: But when you turn, nothing but silence.

scenes.visuals: The figure in the mirror begins to move closer, inching towards the glass.
scenes.audio: The mirror crackles louder, unbearable tension.
scenes.narration: Something inside insists on an approach...

scenes.visuals: Close-up of the protagonist reaching out to touch the glass.
scenes.audio: Breath holds—silence broken by a sudden sharp crack.
scenes.narration: You decide to challenge the unknown...

scenes.visuals: As the protagonist’s fingers touch the mirror, their reflection grabs them, pulling them in.
scenes.audio: A sudden rush of sound, muffled scream, and a final echoing thud.
scenes.narration: But the mirror has secrets of its own... and they want you.

sound_design.key_effects: Distorted mirror crackling, heartbeat, sharp crack as the twist unfolds.
sound_design.narration: Whispered, building tension in tandem with visuals.

details.camera: Tight close-up on protagonist's face and teeth brushing, emphasizing normality.
details.lighting: Bright, clinical lighting to reinforce the sense of normalcy.
details.color_scheme: Cool tones to suggest a calm yet sterile environment.

details.camera: Shift to medium shot focusing on the mirror; subtle pan reveals the shadow.
details.lighting: Introduce subtle shadowing to suggest something amiss.
details.color_scheme: Cool tones with a darker accent on the shadow.
details.transition: Use a slow fade to imply unease.

details.camera: Close-up on the mirror, static and unsettling.
details.lighting: Dimmer with focused light on the figure in the mirror.
details.color_scheme: Increase contrast between light and shadow to heighten suspense.
details.transition: Zoom in slowly to create tension.

details.camera: Over-the-shoulder shot as protagonist turns around, revealing emptiness.
details.color_scheme: Cool, with a slight warm hue on empty space to increase contrast.
details.transition: Sudden cut to mirror to keep unsure suspense.

details.camera: Slow zoom on the mirror as figure moves forward.
details.lighting: Soft light grows harsher as figure approaches.
details.color_scheme: Dark, as the figure advances, with deepening blacks.
details.transition: Cross dissolve to maintain eerie tension.

details.camera: Extreme close-up on protagonist's fingers near the glass.
details.transition: Sudden, jarring cut as connection happens.

details.color_scheme: Chaotic mix, blending cools and warms.

Sounds.music: Crescendo, layered with soft harmonic dissonance.

Sounds.effects: Momentary silence; followed by sharp crack.

Tone & Atmosphere.techniques: Juxtaposition of sight and audio; silence.

Narration.Vocal_Characteristics: Soft, whispered tone; steady build-up in speed.
Narration.Emotional_Layers: Fear of the unknown; cognitive tension.
Narration.Narrative_Technique: Second person narration engages viewers deeply.
Narration.Psychological_Impact: Draws viewer into protagonist's paranoia and fear.
